high_descs: Turn left, walk straight, Turn left towards the laptop.
Close the laptop, pick it up off from the bed
Turn left, turn left toward the trash can, Turn right, Walk to the lamp
Turn on the lamp on the counter
anns.task_desc: Pick up a laptop then turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn completely around. Turn to the right then left and go forward. Make a left and go to face the bed.
Close the laptop and pick it up from the bed.
Turn completely around and walk forward. Turn to the right and face the lamp.
Use the laptop to turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp with a laptop.

high_descs: Turn to your left and walk towards the door, then stop and turn to your left when you reach the foot of the bed.
Close and pick up the lap top, closest to the foot of the bed.
Turn around and go to the dresser with the lamp on it.
Turn the lamp on while holding the lap top.
